Contributing to OpenFisca¶

How to contribute (beta) ?¶

The development of OpenFisca (beta) is an FLOSS project wich code is distributed under the GPL licence version 3 or later.

The source code is freely available and still undergoes heavy development. Feel free to join the OpenFisca developpment team on GitHub or to contact us.

More information on the develepopers guide.
